beer.name: Old Scratch Amber Lager
beer.description: This dog enjoys his days in the sun... Old Scratch Amber Lager is a malty, mellow beer that is fermented at medium temperatures to develop both ale and lager characteristics. "Gold Scratch" raises the standard in the amber lager category.
beer.grains: Crystal Malt, Malted White Wheat, Munich Malt
Crystal Malt, Malted White Wheat, Munich Malt
